Career Profile

I am an educational enthusiast passionate about both natural and social science, also a sophisticated quant with a background in data mining and gaming. I have half an year of teaching experience in high school, four years of quant trading in futures and options and six years of physics research experience in the realm of high energy particles and gravitational waves.

Experiences

Physics Teacher & Class Advisor

2020 - Present
Admiral Farragut Academy at Dongguan, Dongguan

Teaching AP physics, SAT math, AP macroeconomics, programming in python, stock introduction and classic music introduction courses.

Using variety of methods to engage and encourage students focusing in their study. Creating the learning circumstance in class and even has benefited to who are involved in the whole school.

Quant Analyst

2019 - 2020
Ansheng Capital, Hangzhou

Started research of a leading-lag trading system. Developed an arbitrary futures trading and wrote a frontier monitering system by Flask.

Quant Analyst

2017 - 2019
Etiger Capital, Shanghai

Independently developed an arbitrage model and auto trade system for stock index futures. The net return > 12% and sharp ratio > 3 are realized since Oct. 2017 for > 20 million.

Developed and tested a tactical asset allocation strategy with a small account and realized a sharp ration > 3.

Developed and tested an alpha strategy for 50 ETF option with 1 million and realized an alpha close to 6%.

Research on a timing strategy for stock index and stock with Pattern Recognition (Machine Learning)

Provided application tools and analytical support for other tradings in our group.

Python Developer

2013 - 2014
Myto Culture, Nanjing

As part of a small team of developers for a cruise-travel-based startup company, Designed and implemented the first cruise travel marketing system in China by Python/Flask framework, as well as migrated and analyzed the data of cruise tourists.

Developed and maintained the Costa cruise promotion websites, took care of everything from front-end design to server-side coding and server administration (Apache \& WSGI). Primarily used Bootstrap 2.x and then upgraded to 3.x to build the websites.

Education Practice

I never stop learning and practising to help people being better.

Top student - I am top 20 student of Sichuan Province in college entrance exam. I got almost all A/A- in graduate study.
Mental health education - I worked in Mental Health Education and Counseling Center for 4 years at USTC. Got Invovled in assistant, music counsel and data analysis.
Teaching assistant - TA of general physics I, astronomy lab and mechanics lab in UW-Milwaukee. Also lead mechanics lab in UT-RGV. Designed the experiment both indoor and outdoors related to the real life.
Go Club - Started the first Go Club in south Texas area. Design a new Go introduction in English.
Part time teaching - Intern in Chengdu 7 High School. The students who I taught then got trophy in physics research program. Tutor for undergraduate and graduate student in high level courses in my spare time.

Research

You will find some of my research below, I don't post the full list because they are not explorations on the boundary any more.

BayesWave - Developed BayesWave and BayesLine method for searching Stochastic background gravitational wave, which selected the parameters of the small wavelet from large background noise, without knowing the exact models or templates.
Brans-Dicke Theory - Examined whether gravitational waveforms, if they are given in Brans-Dicke theory, could be detected by the LIGO-Virgo network using GR templates.
Gaseous Detector - Designed and implemented a new gaseous counter system and supported for high energy light ion beam detection, along with data storage and analysis solution using C codes.
